subject: CNN Alerts: bush, etc.
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Federal court rules against  enemy combatant policy 

06/11/07 08:06 PM, EDT
A divided panel from a conservative federal appeals court delivered a harsh rebuke to the Bush administration's anti-terrorism strategy Monday, ruling that U.S. residents cannot be locked up indefinitely as "enemy combatants" without being charged.
FULL STORY



Alert Name: My Custom Alert
Google privacy 'worst on the Web'

06/11/07 08:05 PM, EDT
Google Inc.'s privacy practices are the worst among the Internet's top destinations, according to a watchdog group seeking to intensify the recent focus on how the online search leader handles personal information about its users.
FULL STORY
